item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Iran says it never asked to 'grovel' at White House gate
item.description: Iran and Israel continued to exchange attacks into Wednesday amid the latest round of conflict between the two nations.

item.title: Bannon's comments on Iran reflect growing division among Trump's MAGA base
item.description: Steve Bannon said it's a mistake for the U.S. to get involved in direct military action against Iran -- urging Trump to question Israeli intel and Net...

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to delay TikTok ban for 3rd time
item.description: Trump is expected to extend the deadline, which was set to expire on Thursday, requiring China’s ByteDance to divest TikTok’s U.S. business or face a ...

item.title: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem released from hospital after allergic reaction
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem released from a Washington, D.C., hospital Tuesday night after an allergic reaction, a DHS spokesperson said.

item.title: WATCH: Raccoon rescues young cub
item.description: A couple in Franklin, Pennsylvania captured video of a mother raccoon, hanging from her back paws and pulling her kit to safety.
